title: Nobody outscales ryze
body: He is op nobody can 1v1 and his teamfight is strong as fuk

replies.body:
You should write all your QQs in a book. Maybe I'll buy a copy so I can have a nice laugh with my friends.

For the record, he's being reworked.

are you going to ignore the fact that he has 0 range and is countered by the same crap everybody else is countered by, which in just about every game there is tons of...CC??

void staff doesnt remove all MR.

And gets bonus HP with his own R, which extends his W range thankfully to ryze's casting range.

Guess who is getting an ass-full of cane.

{{champion:19}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:157}} 

lolwut.
bump nerf ryze plox
he is op nobody can 1v1 a ryze"

alright MR.silver 4. Lets put things in perspective.

is 1v1 all that matters? is the dmg the problem? the tankyness?

so you know, several champ in league are created to win their 1v1 no matter what. they are called duelists.
but, ryze isnt a duelist per se. at least for most part.

many champs excels at team fight and wont win 1v1s. thats their nature. see, a nasus late game will crush a ryze late game because of their nature, of their kit and how they scale. Ryze scales only thru items, that themselves take a while to bring to strenght. so if his dmg scales of mana, and health takes money to buy and to scale (RoA) then he isnt as strong al lthe time as you say. since he doesnt have the mana: his dmg source, or health: his sustain source. 

So you know, the queens of 1v1s is fiora and poppy. they are meant to win them and thats how it is. good thing we play in a 5v5 environment because that is their weakness.  they need a quick fight with a target. Ryze you see, is none of these per se. tho , he will destroy the adc, not right away, he needs a combo and a half to get the job done, but thats not always enough. he is a late game powerhouse however. but nasus and Sion are the two strongest 1v1 champs kate in the game, Sion being more team fight oriented. Veigar also can absolutly erase ryze from the map late game with a Q and R.
OP aside. I'd say Vayne/Kalista are better late game than SIon/Nasus in a 1v1 duel.
WW destroy very easyly with Spirit Visage, mERCURY bOOTS and Wit end's, he completly destroy Ryze...

Are you talking about live or on the PBE because his strength on his reworked version is very conditional with whether you can start the fight with his passive charged to the right point. Without his passive charged he's not 1v1ing anyone.

And they are reworking him because of how binary his current design is so who cares if his live version is to strong or not at this point.
